name: Veg Food
description: A wholesome and traditional Indian meal served on a platter, featuring a variety of vegetarian dishes including seasonal vegetables, lentils (dal), rice, chapati or roti, pickles, and a sweet dessert. Perfectly balanced in taste and nutrition, offering a delightful mix of flavors, colors, and textures in every bite.

varieties.name: Rajasthani Thali

varieties.name: Maharashtrian Thali

varieties.name: Punjabi Thali
varieties.description: Delicious thali with butter naan, dal makhani, paneer butter masala, jeera rice, and lassi.

varieties.name: Kashmiri Thali
varieties.description: Includes dum aloo, rajma, nadru yakhni, rice, haak, and phirni.
